entry.title: A Tether in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: ReadNowSleepLater

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,677Chapters: 26/?Kudos: 123

Summary: Stiles Stilinski never meant to become a myth. After the fall of his pack and the fading of Beacon Hills’ magic, he runs – straight into a world older, darker, and far more complicated than he ever imagined. Mystic Falls is supposed to be a quiet place to start over, to ground himself again. Instead, it becomes the center of a storm he didn’t know was waiting for him. Drawn into the tangled lives of the Mikaelsons, Stiles finds unexpected warmth among immortals who should’ve terrified him – and something dangerously close to belonging. Between Elijah’s steady grace, Kol’s mischief, Klaus’ possessive charm, and Peter’s return from the shadows, he starts to build something new: a family stitched together by chaos, magic, and a kind of love that defies logic. But magic never lets go without a fight, and neither do old bonds. When ghosts from his past and creatures from the dark rise to claim him, Stiles has to face what it truly means to be an anchor – and what, and who, he’s willing to tether himself to. Because in the end, even in the dark, someone always reaches back.

entry.title: The Part That Survives
entry.summary:
Author: Joy_peace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,159Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 13

Summary: Years after the events of Season 6B, Beacon Hills has grown quieter. The monsters sleep, the pack has built lives, and Liam Dunbar has learned how to breathe again after losing the person he loved most. But grief is strange in Beacon Hills. It doesn’t fade. It rearranges itself into something sharp, something hungry, something that whispers: What if? Five months after Theo Raeken’s death, strange storms begin forming in the woods. Lights flicker. Trees crack with electricity. Liam dreams of Theo like he’s standing right beside him—until the line between dream and reality blurs violently.

entry.title: You’re Safe, I’m Here
entry.summary:
Author: Joy_peace

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,938Chapters: 15/22Kudos: 23

Summary: The Beacon Hills Preserve had always been quiet in the early evenings, the kind of quiet that hummed in the bones of anyone supernatural. Most people would call it peaceful. Liam Dunbar called it suspicious. He walked a few steps ahead, his eyes flicking between the trees, inhaling like he expected to catch a threat in the damp leaves or the wind. His shoulders were coiled tight—too tight for a patrol that was supposed to be routine. The sun hovered low enough to stain the whole forest with orange and copper. Behind him, Theo Raeken let out a slow, theatrical sigh. “Dunbar,” he said, voice low but full of a patience he very smugly claimed he didn’t have, “you’re clenching your jaw so hard I can hear your molars trying to fuse.”

entry.title: A Little Bit Older
entry.summary:
Author: EverythingRara

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,408Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 135

Summary: It was a short twenty-minute ride, and then Stiles was stepping out onto the driveway of his childhood home. “You got a new roof,” Stiles said, eyebrows rising as he took in the fresh shingles. “Yeah,” his father grunted, wrenching Stiles’ luggage out of the trunk. “Tree landed on the house last year. I thought I told you?” Stiles hurried over, reaching for his bags—only for his hand to get smacked away. “I got it,” his father said firmly, like the idea of Stiles carrying his own luggage was some kind of insult. Stiles rolled his eyes and shoved his hands into his pockets. “Yeah, I think I remember now. Scott helped you fix it, didn’t he?” Noah’s face brightened. “He did. Boy’s really made a good company for himself. Had to fight him to let me pay.” Stiles’ smile slipped, memories settling heavy in his stomach. They walked up the driveway. Stiles’ gaze drifted toward the garage, a thought sparking. “Hey, Dad,” he said, scanning the driveway. “Where’s my baby Roscoe?” Noah’s expression pinched. Uncomfortable. Guilty. “About that…"

entry.title: (If) This Is Killing Me
entry.summary:
Author: k_beta_cygni

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,675Chapters: 20/22Kudos: 87

Summary: FROM THE UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF ANOMALY INVESTIGATION EXPEDITION 13, led by USDAI psychologist Lydia Martin and consisting of cellular biologist Mieczysław “Stiles” Stilinski, EMT Scott McCall, ex-Marine Jackson Whittemore, and physicist Kira Yukimura, has entered “The Preserve,” previously known as Cedar Hearth National Park on the pacific coast of the United States. The national park had been evacuated after being overtaken by an anomalous and inhuman force. They are in search of answers for what happened to EXPEDITION 12, a team of Green Berets led by Stilinski’s husband Derek Hale. Hale had returned unexpectedly, showing up in their house with no memory of how he left The Preserve. His subordinates Isaac Lahey, Vernon Boyd, and Erica Reyes have been declared missing by the USDAI. [FILES UPDATED IN NOVEMBER 2025]
